December 11, 2012, Bob was senior to Chuck but didn’t manage directly

“When I first met Chuck Patel he was a strong Sales Engineer, working in the southeast US for us  at the CRM Division of Sage Software. As good as he was in that role I felt he was mis-cast and would make a more substantial contribution to my Sales team if he "owned the region" and so Chuck was promoted to Regional Sales Manager. To some the move from engineering, even sales engineering,  directly into a quota based software sales position might be considered ill advised. Chuck was extremely  successful, and consistently exceeded plan as well as expectations. Chuck is very smart, a really quick study (hey, the guy can fly an airplane and has an engineering background) . He understands sales, managing , leading and developing team members. His ethics are of the highest order. He communicates in a direct, straightforward manner. He works very hard. He has demonstrated a consistent ability to perform at increasingly higher levels while assuming larger responsibilities. Chuck is a winner and a strong teammate, and now, a friend.

September 12, 2012, John worked with Chuck but at different companies

What a pleasure to get to know and work with Chuck Patel!  Chuck knows his customers well and they in turn trust him as a strategic advisor and friend.  During my tenure at QlikTech, Champs Software became a strategic partner of mine and this was entirely due to Chuck Patel.  Together we were able to significantly increase Champs Software business intelligence revenue and place in the Top 10 for fiscal year 2011.  This accomplishment was a testament to Chuck's ability to create demand, follow up and propose a solution and gain the customers confidence.Look forward to working with Chuck in the future!
